file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-40-04-04 - TOILET SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TOILET SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the toilet shroud assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-40-04-000-801-A TOILET SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL TOILET SHROUD ASSEMBLY - INSTAL- ALL 25-40-04-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-40-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TOILET SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the toilet shroud assembly. (2) The toilet shroud assembly is installed in the lavatory, at zone 262. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Lift the toilet seat assembly (1). (2) Release the Dzus fastener (3) of the toilet shroud assembly (2). (3) Lift the toilet shroud assembly (2) and pull to remove it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Toilet Shroud Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 262 B DET. A 1. TOILET SEAT ASSEMBLY 3. DZUS C 2. TOILET SHROUD ASSY DET. C 5. WASHER DET.B 4. NUT 145AMM250624.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. TOILET SHROUD ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the toilet shroud assembly. (2) The toilet shroud assembly is installed in the lavatory, at zone 262. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) If you removed the toilet seat assembly (1), install it again as follows: (a) Install the toilet seat assembly (1) at the correct position. (b) Tighten the nut (4) and washer (5). (2) Put the toilet shroud assembly (2) in its installation position. (3) Attach the toilet shroud assembly (2) with the Dzus fastener (3). (4) Close the toilet seat assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-40-04 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
